slogan: "A city that listens, a city that reflects you"
description: Crystal Town is a city concept made for a brighter future where trust is built through transparency. A city that shares its data, makes its choices visible, and involves its residents at every stage of the decision-making process.

eye_projects.title: Have an overview of all the projects underway in your city
eye_projects.description: Thanks to our platform, stay connected to your city in real time. Stay informed about all the projects underway, vote on whether or not to implement a project, sign up for co-decision workshops... Become a major player in the city of tomorrow!

infos.title: Centralize all your city's information
infos.description: A platform, transparent communication, co-construction of the city of tomorrow

explain: A calendar updated in real time to keep you informed of the duration of projects, their nature and their progress.
image_online: Images and online report available to you

first-project.title: A first project set up with you.
first-project.description: Redevelopment of spaces and de-permeabilization of soils
first-project.text: We believe it's essential to begin with a transformation of the space, involving everyone. The goal is to take back control of your city, collaborate, engage, learn about each other, and transform your city to reflect your image by supporting sustainable causes. Building the city of tomorrow begins with building ecological and social transparency.

report:

Objective: to improve your daily life, to report problems, so that you can take action accordingly.
